description:
Model checking that gets issues solved

BIMcollab Zoom is the only model checking solution smoothly integrated with BIM coordination. Easily combine models, analyze object properties and find clashes faster than ever with intuitive model checking.
Find issues, communicate them and verify solutions. Visualize and share customized views with stakeholders and empower them to address design issues in the early stages of the project.
Improvements
- Updated UI framework version to address start-up problems
- The License Agreement has been updated to reflect recent enhancements in our analytical capabilities aimed at optimizing system performance and improving user experience while maintaining data privacy and security.
- Added the option to disable data collection via the general settings

Bug fixes
- Fixed silent install of VC++ redistributables for .msi installer
- Fixed problem with loading new model version from WebViewer
- Fixed problem with visibility of System in summary and Smart View results
